description:
1.If they throw stones at you, don’t throw back, use them to build your own foundation instead. 如果别人朝你扔石头，就不要扔回去了，留着作你建高楼的基石。

2.Make yourself a better person and know who you are before you try and know someone else and expect them to know you.在你想了解别人也想让别人了解你之前，先完善并了解自己。

3.after a storm comes a calm. 雨过天晴。

4.You never know your luck.命运好坏不由己。

5.Even a great life is only a life until you make it.美好生活,自己创造.

6.Bad times make a good man.艰难困苦出能人。

7.Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.抱最好的希望，做最坏的打算。

8.All things in their being are good for something.天生我才必有用

9.One needs 3 things to be truly happy living in the world: some thing to do, some one to love, some thing to hope for.在这个世界我们只需拥有三件事便可真正快乐:有自己向往的事业;有自己爱的人;还有希望.
